name: Servant of Yig
description: The Servant of Yig is a twisted aberration that embodies the dark nature of Yig. It has a strong physique, agile presence, and features abilities to charm and instill fear in its foes.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and poison targets makes it particularly deadly in close combat.
goals: To serve Yig and sow chaos using its abilities to charm and confuse others.
relations: Serving Yig, it may be encountered alongside other aberrations or creatures influenced by dark magic.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas or near bodies of water.
strengths: Magic Resistance provides it with an advantage against spells, and proficiency in stealth makes it an effective ambusher.
weaknesses: An Armor Class of 12 makes it relatively easy to hit in combat.
attacks: Uses a multiattack to deliver both piercing and poison damage with its bite along with slashing damage from its glaive.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to poison targets, incapacitating them while inflicting ongoing damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 10 feet, enabling it to perceive its surroundings even without light.
skills: Highly proficient in stealth, perception, and persuasion, allowing it to infiltrate and manipulate.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions related to poison.
Can charm humanoids and instill fear in creatures.
Has a powerful grappling ability with the Constrict action.
Decent physical and mental attributes, contributing to its versatility.
Uses spellcasting to influence battles and control opponents.
spellcasting: Can cast charm person and fear three times per day each, and confusion once per day using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
